tab1.text1: Welcome to Project Leda, please read the RULES tab before building... If you need Admin assistance and we are not online create a ticket in Discord and any available admin will assist youOur current stats are; 1.1x Experience, 2.8x Taming, 1.6x Harvest, If you need Admin assistance and we are not online create a ticket in Discord and any available admin will assist you

tab2.text1: - No bullying of any sort. This includes but is not limited to racism, homophobia or bigotry.- No building over rare resources. (eg. Dams, Metal Nodes, Kairuku spawns, etc.) If you are unsure please ask staff if your potential base location is safe for building.- No building in Artifact Caves (Don't leave sleeping bags in or near caves once you clear it, it'll be destroyed.)- No building near Obelisks or leaving tames at them, they will be red gunned.- Each tribe is limited to one base, and one outpost.- When you are taking items from drops, dams, etc, make sure to take everything out even if you just popcorn the extras, so it can properly respawn for others.- You may build next to someone's base as long as you get permission from said tribe to be their neighbor.- No spamming foundations, pillars, or any other structures to block off people from building near you or to block spawns.
